title: Persipura Jayapura U-21
text:
<noinclude> 
Persipura Jayapura U-20 is a professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Jayapura">Jayapura</a>, <a href="Papua%20%28province%29">Papua</a>, <a href="Indonesia">Indonesia</a>. The team nickname is "The Young Pearls" or "Mutiara Muda". Persipura competes in the top division in Indonesian football. Persipura's stadium is known as the <a href="Mandala%20Stadium">Mandala Stadium</a>, which has a capacity of over 25,000 fans. The stadium is located near Dok 5 beach. The stadium has a beautiful view and is close to the local fishing village. To the east is scenic <a href="Cyclops%20Mountains">Cyclops Mountains</a>.
Stadium.
Persipura Jayapura use Mandala Stadium as their home field. The stadium has a capacity of around 30,000 seats and still being renovated for 50,000 seat capacity. Mandala Stadium located in downtown Jayapura around Dok V, near the mouth of Humboldt Bay (otherwise known as "Teluk Jayapura"). The stadium is located approximately from Sentani Airport.
